fields: [{"name":"xLocation","type":"int","description":"the x coordinate of the `Painter` object"},{"name":"yLocation","type":"int","description":"the y coordinate of the `Painter` object"},{"name":"direction","type":"Direction","description":"the direction the `Painter` object is facing (`\"North\"`, `\"South\"`, `\"East\"`, or `\"West\"`)"},{"name":"remainingPaint","type":"int","description":"the number of units of paint the `Painter` object has in their paint bucket"}]
name: Painter

methods.name: Painter
methods.content: Creates a `Painter` object at `(0, 0)` facing `"East"` with `0` units of paint

methods.name: Painter
methods.content: Creates a `Painter` at specific x and y coordinates facing a specified direction with a given number of units of paint.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"x","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the x coordinate to place the `Painter` object"},{"name":"y","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the y coordinate to place the `Painter` object"},{"name":"direction","type":"String","required":true,"description":"the direction for the `Painter` object to face"},{"name":"paint","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the number of units of paint the `Painter` object starts with"}]
methods.syntax: `public Painter(int x, int y, String direction, int paint)`

methods.name: move
methods.content: Moves the `Painter` object one space forward in the direction it is facing.

methods.name: turnLeft
methods.content: Turns a `Painter` object to the left.

methods.name: paint
methods.content: Paints the space the `Painter` object is standing on.

methods.name: takePaint
methods.content: Takes paint from the paint bucket the `Painter` object is currently standing on and adds a single unit of paint to their paint bucket. The number of units of paint in the paint bucket decreases by `1`. If the `Painter` object is not on a paint bucket, nothing happens.

methods.name: scrapePaint
methods.content: Removes the paint from the space the `Painter` object is standing on.

methods.name: canMove
methods.content: Returns `true` if there is no barrier one space ahead in the direction the `Painter` object is currently facing.

methods.name: canMove
methods.content: Returns `true` if there is no barrier one space ahead in the specified direction.

methods.name: isOnPaint
methods.content: Returns `true` if there is paint on the space the `Painter` object is currently standing on.

methods.name: isOnBucket
methods.content: Returns `true` if there is a paint bucket on the space the `Painter` object is currently standing on.

methods.name: hasPaint
methods.content: Returns `true` if the `Painter` object has paint in their paint bucket.

methods.name: isFacingNorth
methods.content: Returns `true` if the `Painter` object is currently facing `"North"`.

methods.name: isFacingSouth
methods.content: Returns `true` if the `Painter` object is currently facing `"South"`.

methods.name: isFacingEast
methods.content: Returns `true` if the `Painter` object is currently facing `"East"`.

methods.name: isFacingWest
methods.content: Returns `true` if the `Painter` object is currently facing `"West"`.

methods.name: getMyPaint
methods.content: Returns the number of units of paint that the `Painter` object has in their paint bucket.

methods.name: getColor
methods.content: Returns the color of the space the `Painter` object is currently standing on.

methods.name: getX
methods.content: Returns the x coordinate for the current position of the `Painter` object.

methods.name: getY
methods.content: Returns the y coordinate for the current position of the `Painter` object.

methods.name: getDirection
methods.content: Returns the direction that the `Painter` object is currently facing.

methods.name: setPaint
methods.content: Sets the number of units of paint in the `Painter` object's paint bucket. If the value passed is a negative number, nothing happens.
methods.parameters: [{"name":"paint","type":"int","required":true,"description":"the number of units of paint that should be in the `Painter` object's paint bucket"}]
